job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: stronguJob DescriptionbrbrustrongImportant Note During the application process ensure your contact information email and phone number is up to date and upload your current resume when submitting your application for consideration To participate in some selection activities you will need to respond to an invitation The invitation can be sent by both email and text message In order to receive text message invitations your profile must include a mobile phone number designated as Personal Cell or Cellular in the contact information of your applicationbrbrAt Wells Fargo we are looking for talented people who will put our customers at the center of everything we do We are seeking candidates who embrace diversity equity and inclusion in a workplace where everyone feels valued and inspiredbrbrHelp us build a better Wells Fargo It all begins with outstanding talent It all begins with youbrbrTechnology sets IT strategy enhances the design development and operations of our systems optimizes the Wells Fargo infrastructure provides information security and enables Wells Fargo global customers to have 24 hours a day 7 days a week banking access through inbranch online ATMs and other channelsbrbrOur mission is to deliver stable secure scalable and innovative services at speeds that delight and satisfy our customers and unleash the skills potential of our employeesbrbrThe Cyber Security Innovation CSI team is looking for a back end developer on the Cyber Security Correlation and Automation CSCA tool CSCA is a 2petabyte cluster of various sets of data utilized buy various teams Were looking to expand use of CSCA and need a developer to help build out a new application in a modern techstack nodeJS focused on a revised set of core functionalitybrbrThe selected candidate will be a developer who will work directly with the core CSCA team as a backend developer writing NodeJS codebrbrActs in a technical role providing technical guidance and consultation with application teams clients and Engineering Managers for their technology domain environments including but not limited to cloud middleware operating systems applications SoftwareasaService and PlatformasaService products Design code test debug and document programs using Agile development practicesbrbrProvides the input to design for projects associated with their technology domain including upgrades and deploymentsbrbrUtilizes advanced technologies and methods to integrate their technology domain with other technology domains enabling the creation of new or expanded heterogeneous environmentsbrbrDevelops new documentation and departmental technical procedures Directs the gathering of performance statistics to assist in determining hardware and communication tools needed to support projectedbrbrtransaction volumes response time and system availability targetsbrbrAssures quality security and compliance requirements are met for supported technology domain Leads projects and as an escalation point provides guidance and direction to less experienced staff in resolution of highly complex technical problems Assures quality security and compliance requirements are met for supported technology domainbrbrThe selected candidate will be a member of the CSCA development team The primary role will focus on back end development The selected candidate should be comfortable in an agile scrum working environment comfortable working as part of a small team on independent tasks and working on a highly visible custom built applicationbrbrThe salary range
